[I]0-i ’ll take [you]149-you on a journey of love , pain , heartache and happily ever afters . Chapter One]157-thirty - seven chapter thirty - eight chapter thirty - nine chapter forty chapter forty - one chapter forty - two chapter forty - three chapter forty - four about the author chapter one

[Not one single person]159-not one single person ? [A place where [you]149-you could start fresh and reinvent [yourself]149-you]160-a place where you could start fresh and reinvent yourself ? Chapter Thirty - Two

Chapter Forty - Four

About [the Author
